cell-props.type: | Record<string, any>  | ((      data: Pick<        ItemKeySlot<any>,        'value' | 'item' | 'index' | 'internalItem' | 'column'      >,    ) => Record<string, any>)
cell-props.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用程序颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

custom-key-sort.description: Function used on specific keys within the item object. customSort is skipped for columns with customKeySort specified.
custom-key-sort.description_zh: 用于 item 对象中特定键的函数。对于指定了 customKeySort 的列，将跳过 customSort。

density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.
density.description_zh: 调整组件使用的垂直高度。

expanded.description: Whether the item is expanded or not.

expand-on-click.description: Expands item when the row is clicked.

fixed-footer.description: Use the fixed-footer prop together with the height prop to fix the footer to the bottom of the table.
fixed-footer.description_zh: 将固定页脚道具与高度道具一起使用，将页脚固定在桌子底部。

fixed-header.description: Use the fixed-header prop together with the height prop to fix the header to the top of the table.
fixed-header.description_zh: 将 fixed-header prop 与 height prop 一起使用，将 header 固定到表的顶部。

group-by.description: Defines the grouping of the table items.

header-props.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

headers.type: {  readonly key?:    | 'data-table-group'    | 'data-table-select'    | 'data-table-expand'    | (string & {})    | undefined  readonly value?: SelectItemKey  readonly title?: string | undefined  readonly fixed?: boolean | undefined  readonly align?: 'start' | 'end' | 'center' | undefined  readonly width?: string | number | undefined  readonly minWidth?: string | undefined  readonly maxWidth?: string | undefined  readonly headerProps?: { readonly [x: string]: any } | undefined  readonly cellProps?:    | { readonly [x: string]: any }    | ((        data: Pick<          ItemKeySlot<any>,          'value' | 'item' | 'index' | 'internalItem'        >,      ) => Record<string, any>)    | undefined  readonly sortable?: boolean | undefined  readonly sort?: DataTableCompareFunction<any> | undefined  readonly sortRaw?: DataTableCompareFunction<any> | undefined  readonly filter?: FilterFunction | undefined  readonly children?: readonly any[] | undefined}[]
headers.description: An array of objects that each describe a header column.
headers.description_zh: 一个对象数组，每个对象描述一个标题列。

height.description: Use the height prop to set the height of the table.
height.description_zh: 使用 height prop 设置桌子的高度。

hide-no-data.description: When there are no options to display, hide the menu. Used to prevent the menu from opening before the results are obtained asynchronously. There is also the effect of opening the menu when the items array changes if it is not already open.
hide-no-data.description_zh: 当没有要显示的选项时，隐藏菜单。用于防止在异步获取结果之前打开菜单。也有打开菜单的效果，当“ items 数组改变，如果还没有打开。

hover.description: Will add a hover effect to a table’s row when the mouse is over it.
hover.description_zh: 当鼠标悬停在表的行上时，将向表的行添加悬停效果。

items.description: An array of strings or objects used for automatically generating children components.
items.description_zh: 用于自动生成子组件的字符串或对象的数组。

item-selectable.description: Property on supplied items that indicates whether the item is selectable.
item-selectable.description_zh: 所提供项的属性，指示项是否可选。

items-per-page.description: The number of items to display on each page.
items-per-page.description_zh: 要在每页上显示的项目数。

items-per-page-options.description: Array of options to show in the items-per-page dropdown.
items-per-page-options.description_zh: 要在“每页项目数”下拉列表中显示的选项数组。

items-per-page-text.description_zh: “每页项目数”下拉列表的文本。

item-value.description: Property on supplied items that contains its value.
item-value.description_zh: 所提供项的属性，其中包含其值。

loading.description: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - primary, secondary, success, info, warning, error) or a Boolean which uses the component color (set by color prop - if it’s supported by the component) or the primary color.
loading.description_zh: 显示线性进度条。可以是指定应用于进度条的颜色的 String（任何材质颜色或主题颜色 - 主要、次要、成功、信息、警告、错误），也可以是使用组件颜色（由 color 属性设置 - 如果组件支持）或主要颜色的布尔值。

loading-text.description: Text shown when the data is loading.
loading-text.description_zh: 加载数据时显示的文本。

:v-model.description: The value of the component v-mode. If the component supports variants, the default is an empty array.
:v-model.description_zh: 组件 v-mode 的值。如果组件支持多属性，默认为空数组。

no-data-text.description: Text shown when no items are provided to the component.
no-data-text.description_zh: 未向组件提供任何项时显示的文本。

page.description_zh: 当前显示的页码（1 索引）。

return-object.description: Changes the selection behavior to return the object directly rather than the value specified with item-value.
return-object.description_zh: 更改选择行为以直接返回对象，而不是返回使用 item-value 指定的值。

row-props.type: | Record<string, any>  | ((      data: Pick<ItemKeySlot<any>, 'item' | 'index' | 'internalItem'>,    ) => Record<string, any>)
row-props.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

search.description: Text input used to filter items.
search.description_zh: 用于筛选项目的文本输入。

select-strategy.description: Defines the strategy of selecting items in the list. Possible values are: ‘single’ (only one item can be selected at a time), ‘page’ (‘Select all’ button will select only items on the current page), ‘all’ (‘Select all’ button will select all items in the list).
select-strategy.description_zh: 定义在列表中选择项的策略。可能的值为：“single”（一次只能选择一个项目）、“page”（“全选”按钮将仅选择当前页面上的项目）、“all”（“全选”按钮将选择列表中的所有项目）。

show-current-page.description: Show current page number between prev/next icons.
show-current-page.description_zh: 在上一个/下一个图标之间显示当前页码。

show-select.description: Shows the column with checkboxes for selecting items in the list.
show-select.description_zh: 显示带有复选框的列，用于选择列表中的项。

sort-asc-icon.description: Icon used for ascending sort button.
sort-asc-icon.description_zh: 用于升序排序按钮的图标。

sort-by.description: Array of column keys and sort orders that determines the sort order of the table.
sort-by.description_zh: 列键和排序顺序的数组，用于确定表的排序顺序。

sort-desc-icon.description: Icon used for descending sort button.
sort-desc-icon.description_zh: 用于降序排序按钮的图标。

sticky.description: Sticks the header to the top of the table.
sticky.description_zh: 将标题粘贴到表格的顶部。

tag.description: Specifies the custom tag to be used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定在根元素上使用的自定义标签。

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 为此组件及其所有子组件指定主题。

value-comparator.description: Apply a custom comparison algorithm to compare model-value and values contains in the items prop.
value-comparator.description_zh: 应用自定义比较算法来比较模型值和 items 属性中包含的值。

width.description: Sets the width of the component.

events.name: update:expanded
events.description: Emits when the expanded property of the options prop is updated.
events.description_zh: 在更新 options 属性的 expanded 属性时发出。

events.name: update:groupBy
events.description: Emits when the group-by property of the options property is updated.
events.description_zh: 在更新 options 属性的 group-by 属性时发出。

events.name: update:itemsPerPage
events.description: Emits when the items-per-page property of the options prop is updated.
events.description_zh: 当 options 属性的 items-per-page 属性更新时发出。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Emits when the component’s model changes.
events.description_zh: 当组件的模型更改时发出。

events.name: update:options
events.description: Emits when one of the options properties is updated.
events.description_zh: 在其中一个选项属性更新时发出。

events.name: update:page
events.description: Emits when the page property of the options prop is updated.
events.description_zh: 当 options 属性的 page 属性更新时发出。

events.name: update:sortBy
events.description: Emits when the sort-by property of the options prop is updated.
events.description_zh: 当 options 属性的 sort-by 属性更新时发出。

slots.name: bottom
slots.description: Slot to add content below the table.
slots.description_zh: 用于在表格下方添加内容的插槽。

slots.name: colgroup
slots.description: Slot to replace the default rendering of the <colgroup> element.
slots.description_zh: 用于替换元素默认呈现的槽<colgroup>。

slots.name: data-table-group
slots.description: Slot for custom rendering of a group.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义渲染组的插槽。

slots.name: data-table-select
slots.description: Slot for custom rendering of a header cell with the select checkbox.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义呈现标题单元格的插槽，带有选择复选框。

slots.name: default
slots.description: Default Vue slot.
slots.description_zh: 默认Vue 插槽。

slots.name: expanded-row
slots.description: Slot for custom rendering of an expanded row.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义呈现展开行的插槽。

slots.name: footer.prepend
slots.description: Adds content to the empty space in the footer.
slots.description_zh: 将内容添加到页脚中的空白区域。

slots.name: group-header
slots.description: Slot for custom rendering of a group header.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义呈现组标头的插槽。

slots.name: header.data-table-expand
slots.description: MISSING DESCRIPTION (edit in github)
slots.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

slots.name: header.data-table-select
slots.description: MISSING DESCRIPTION (edit in github)
slots.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

slots.name: headers
slots.description: Slot to replace the default rendering of the <thead> element.
slots.description_zh: 用于替换元素默认呈现的槽<thead>。

slots.name: item
slots.description: Slot to replace the default rendering of a row.
slots.description_zh: 用于替换行的默认呈现的 Slot。

slots.name: item.data-table-expand
slots.description: Slot to replace the default v-icon used when expanding rows.
slots.description_zh: 用于替换展开行时使用的默认 V 图标的插槽。

slots.name: item.data-table-select
slots.description: Slot to replace the default checkbox used when selecting rows.
slots.description_zh: 用于替换选择行时使用的默认复选框的插槽。

slots.name: loader
slots.description: Slot for custom loader (displayed when loading prop is equal to true).
slots.description_zh: 自定义加载器的插槽（当加载道具等于 true 时显示）。

slots.name: loading
slots.description: Defines content for when loading is true and no items are provided.
slots.description_zh: 定义加载为 true 且未提供任何项时的内容。

slots.name: no-data
slots.description: Defines content for when no items are provided.
slots.description_zh: 定义未提供任何项时的内容。

slots.name: tbody
slots.description: Slot to replace the default rendering of the <tbody> element.
slots.description_zh: 用于替换元素默认呈现的槽<tbody>。

slots.name: tfoot
slots.description: Slot to replace the default rendering of the <tfoot> element.
slots.description_zh: 用于替换元素默认呈现的槽<tfoot>。

slots.name: thead
slots.description: Slot to replace the default rendering of the <thead> element.
slots.description_zh: 用于替换元素默认呈现的槽<thead>。

slots.name: top
slots.description: Slot to add content above the table.
slots.description_zh: 用于在表格上方添加内容的插槽。
